name: Dörmant
description:
Dörmant (alt+0246 for umlaut)

Created for the 2014 Toronto Game Jam by Mackenzie Eaton (Code/Design) and Tom Burns Rogers (Art/Design)

How to Play: You are a doorman, let tenants into the building, check the tenant list at your desk,

accept packages for tenants. Sitting at the desk regains stamina.

Don't let intruders into the building or accept wrongly addressed packages.

After You.

Art via Google Images and Earthbound/Mother

Created with Unity 4.3.4

(Last Updated: May 9th, 2014)
